summary:
HDT Physics Extensions compatible Khajiit tails.
Male is still basic. Argonians work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Introduction:[/size]
Only collides with ground at your feet (to little effect).
Don't turn too hard in place. It violates the laws of physics.
Spazzes out occasionally (jitter in tail base and more rarely overall 'flying apart').
If the tail does fly apart: I'm not sure what's causing it. If it happens frequently: bug-report.
It [i]should[/i] calm down within 30 seconds, no matter what you do.
Will work with any body, but the mesh is somewhat optimized for UNP Skinny.
Since this is a small body you will not get seams with any other body, but the tails base might not merge as perfectly.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url] required.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30760/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url] recommended.

If you encounter strange behaviour or serious problems:
I opened a forum thread for this. Some issues are not too difficult to fix,
although I have yet to find a solution for some rarer issues
(like the tail flying apart for no apparent reason occasionally).
If the game crashes after installation just try again a few times; it should work once it works.
If that's not the case then there might be a HDT version, configuration or load order problem.

[size=5]News[/size]
A patch to add tails for male Khajiits has been released. Currently it's quite basic, but not bad.
Argonian tails are next, but they need adjustments on the mesh itself to look good. So not today.
If you want to help improving the XML files you are welcome to do so.
Google "hdtHavokModifier Just For Fun". It will lead you to the XML tool.
Be warned: editing the files is a huge p in the a.

[b]720p videos. Skimpy by necessity, but SFW. Best watched directly on the tube.[/b]I guess I'll need a fourth one to make it a square.

Dancing                                                                                                  Idle Animation
[youtube]M_BFVSpFFm4[/youtube][youtube]yRfCF_p9OyY[/youtube]
[youtube]qOhUMOnuRtw[/youtube]
Movement

[size=4]Overall prospects[/size]
I'm not sure there's much potential for betterment without a truly new tail mesh and rig,
but if you tweak and improve these files please inform me of your progress!
[u]Khajiit is unlikely to modify these files much further hisself.[/u]

[size=4]Uninstall[/size]
To uninstall delete the tail meshes from Data/Meshes/actors/character/Character Assets/ (maletailkhajiit.nif and femaletailkhajiit.nif)
and Physics xml files from Data/SKSE/plugins/ (HDTmaletailkhajiit.xml, floor.xml and HDTTail.xml)

Credits:
Bethesda (original tail mesh)
b00marrows (original tail mesh rig and prior HDTTail.xml)
Yoo (prior Floor.xml)
Microlich (editing)
author: Microlich
